p: For determination of genotoxic and antigenotoxic activity, phosphate-buffered saline solution (PBS) was purchased from Fisher Scientific (Pittsburgh, PA, USA); hydrogen peroxide was purchased from Zorka Pharma (Å abac, Serbia), low-melting-point agarose (LMPA) and normal-melting-point agarose (NMPA) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
